## Type of Change

<!-- Select the type that best describes this PR (used for automatic versioning) -->

- [ ] `fix:` Bug fix (patch release)
- [ ] `feat:` New feature (minor release)
- [ ] `breaking:` Breaking change (major release)
- [ ] `docs:` Documentation only
- [ ] `chore:` Maintenance (no release)
- [ ] `refactor:` Code refactoring (no release)
- [ ] `test:` Adding tests (no release)

## Release Label

<!-- Add ONE of these labels to control the release (or let it auto-detect from title) -->

| Label | When to use |
|-------|-------------|
| `release:patch` | Bug fixes, small improvements |
| `release:minor` | New features, enhancements |
| `release:major` | Breaking changes |
| `release:skip` | No release needed |
